about_the_game:
This is an AVG management adventure game with a post-apocalyptic survival theme. You play as a military enthusiast who built a simple shelter in advance out of interest before the end of the world. But I didn't expect that the doomsday would really break out. This simple shelter became the best barrier between ordinary people and zombies.

Game features:

·[Early game: When you don’t know the end is coming, use existing money to enrich shelter supplies and improve the shelter]


·[The end is coming: Some people who know your hobbies, friends, colleagues, neighbors... try to enter your shelter, you can choose whether to let them in. 】


·[Shelter Management: After you gather your teammates, how to distribute the only food and water sources is a big problem]


·[If it is not managed well: it may cause all members to become depressed, or they may remain silent forever at the end of the world. 】


·[Night events: If there is not enough food, the character's status will decline rapidly, and night events such as exhaustion and transactions will occur. 】


·[Cultivation of goodwill, side plots: The focus is not only on the inside of the shelter, but also on side missions outside the shelter. 】

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains partial nudity or sexually suggestive content and may not be appropriate for all ages.

But I didn't expect that the doomsday would really break out. This simple shelter became the best barrier between ordinary people and zombies.

name: Apocalypse Love Shelter Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Zombie apocalypse world! You built a shelter in advance, and countless girls wanted to enter your shelter for self-protection. Female neighbor, flight attendant, female boss, celebrity... All beings are equal before the end of time.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
